pullRequest.title: Add database information to getDatabase calls
pullRequest.bodyText:
Previously, database information are not fetched from the udb and
hence the database information provided to the connnector is missing
some vital information such as owner and location.

commit.message:
Add database information to getDatabase calls.

Previously, database information are not fetched from the udb and
hence the database information provided to the connnector is missing
some vital information such as owner and location.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -44,4 +46,9 @@
    * @return the {@link UdbContext}
    */
   UdbContext getUdbContext();
+
+  /**
+   * @return get owner name

nodes.bodyText: Why remove this processing? If we fail to sync the db, we should not have attached the db, right?
why can't the mDBs.values() also add the DBInfo entries?

Is there ever a scenario when the dbInfo is already populated? Can't we just keep it null until it is updated? I think a failed db sync will remove the db. Then, we don't have to pass in null as a parameter.
We can make all of these final?

nodes.bodyText: can the map contain at least 1 mapping?
Here we are calling getJournalEntryIterator on every db, mDBs.values is a list of all DB objects.

nodes.bodyText: can we use MoreObjects.toStringHelper(this) like we do elsewhere in the codebase?
Yes, so when we are returning journal entries for a database (the table entries), can we also return the dbInfo one as well?
